name: Untitled 3D RPG prototype
description:
Small 3D RPG prototype made in unity using synty studios assets.

Testing out working in 3D and some RPG mechanics.

Some gifs with progress included on my website: https://roszar351.github.io/Secret/

Currently prototype is not being worked on further.

Controls:

▪ Left click to move
▪ Right click to interact/attack objects and enemies.
▪ 'L' for quest log
▪ 'I' for inventory
▪ 'C' for character sheet
▪ 1-6 number keys(not numpad) for abilities
▪ Arrow keys and mouse wheel to alter the camera
▪ Press 'Z', 'Y' and 'U' together to enable cheats
▪ Looks better in fullscreen. Have fun!
